actionConfiguration.body:
select resp.chapter_tag, resp.chapter_name, stm.name 
from (select * from chapter_details_master
where chapter_details_master.std={{Select_Class.selectedOptionLabel}} and     
chapter_details_master.subject_id={{Select_Subject.selectedOptionValue}} 
and chapter_details_master.publication_id = 
(select sa.publication_id from lb_school_details as lsd
join school_class_info as sci
on lsd.school_id = sci.school_id
join school_academy as sa
on sci.class_id = sa.class_id
where lsd.school_id = {{Select_School.selectedOptionValue}} and sci.class_id = {{Select_Class.selectedOptionValue}} and sa.subject_id = {{Select_Subject.selectedOptionValue}})) resp
left join (select * from chapters_handled as ch
	  where ch.section_id = {{Select_Section.selectedOptionValue}}) inp
on resp.chapter_tag = inp.chapter_tag
left join school_teachers_master as stm
on inp.teacher_id = stm.teacher_id
order by chapter_tag;
